name: vicariousness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being vicarious (= experienced through the activities of other people, rather than by doing something yourself): We watch the film with a feeling of intense vicariousness. Following sports can offer the opportunity for vicariousness and wish-fulfilment. See
vicarious
More examplesFewer examplesOne of the most harmful kinds of vicariousness is a parent's living out fantasies through a child.Art can offer vicariousness (the illusion of direct experience).She lived her daughter's career with fierce vicariousness.
